txt.en:
'Before the city became a battleground, I used to come to this place to sit and watch the water. I would spend hours letting my mind wander as I gazed over the small, rippling waves.

'I have not felt peace and contentment like that in a long time. It is something I dearly miss, and I hope that one day I can sit and enjoy that feeling again.

'Let us take a small moment to rest and forget these terrible times we live in. <rgb=#FF0000>Look</rgb> to the horizon with me and let us wish for happier times.'
'Did you see it too? The small light on the horizon amid the darkness of the clouds? There is hope yet for us all. We will withstand this storm.'
On a clear day, you can see nearly across the expanse of Lake Evendim.
Though all before you looks grim, hope shines in the distance
This is a good place to <rgb=#FF0000>look</rgb> to the horizon
Orchalwë spoke of spending time by the shore looking to the far horizon.
Find a place to look over Lake Evendim
Orchalwë will want to hear what you thought while looking to the horizon.
